name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A simple two-player game where players take turns placing Xs and Os on a 3Ã—3 grid. The first player to align three symbols horizontally, vertically, or diagonally wins.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: A quick and fun two-player game where each player chooses rock, paper, or scissors. Rock beats scissors, scissors beats paper, and paper beats rock. The player with the winning move takes the round!

name: Flip a coin
description: A simple and fun game where you flip a virtual coin to get either heads or tails. Perfect for making quick decisions or testing your luck!
